result.reason: Touchpad scroll in embedded PuTTY panels causes focus to shift to the parent mRemoteNG container, requiring a click to regain keyboard input — fixable by intercepting WM_MOUSEWHEEL in InterfaceControl and forwarding to the PuTTY handle.
result.approach: Override WndProc in InterfaceControl to intercept WM_MOUSEWHEEL (0x20A) messages when the active protocol is PuttyBase, and forward them via PostMessage to PuttyHandle instead of letting them bubble up to the parent container which steals focus.
